description: Skoki Lodge to Merlin Lake. (5.8km return) The trail starts at Skoki Lodge (see Skoki Trail).The trail climbs up through treeline then follows above tree line along edge of steep mountain side.. Providing panoramic breathtaking views of Castellija Lake. Trail climbs steeply overly bluff at end of Castelliga lake and ascends to Merlin Lake. The bluff can be scaled bt following narrow rock ledge or climbig directly over wall.The mid September day we went brought hail and glorious sunshine resulting in magnificent full rainbows spanning the valey below.
directions: The trail starts at Skoki Lodge (see Skoki Trail).
title: Merlin Lake
